Room.Name: Passage Over the Cyclops Den
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a path that has abruptly stopped at a large crater.
Room.LongDescription: Peering down over the edge of the crater, you notice that there's actually a room down there. It appears to be the den of the great Cyclops. He is rumored to have a number of great and powerful weapons that no one has been able to duplicate efficiently.
